<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete recurring event instance"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/{EventId}/{instance}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a specific instance of a recurring event series by index. Use this to remove one occurrence without deleting the entire series or future instances.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventId` for the series parent.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate the series parent: [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventId`.
2. Choose the instance index from the series schedule.
3. Delete the occurrence: [DELETE /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}/\{instance\}](/docs/api/events/delete-recurring-event).

**Minimal Required Fields**: EventId and instance (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"EventId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"instance","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Instance index to delete.","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
